programme.title: Just For Laughs Gags S23
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: The $100,000 Pyramid S6
programme.desc: Two teams of two compete in a word-association game. Each contestant gets a celebrity partner, and one partner provides clues to the other about six mystery words, leaving the other to guess those words before the time runs out. The team with the most points gets to play in the winners circle, where the top prize is $100,000. Michael Strahan hosts.

programme.title: MasterChef Junior USA S8
programme.desc: The Top 10 chefs start their engines for the ultimate race of the season, as they head over to a secret destination for their challenge. The strongest communicators are picked as team captains, as they compete to create the best American-style comfort dish for a team of very hungry motorsport racers.

programme.title: India Unplated S1
programme.desc: Punjabi cuisine is notably one of the most popular cuisines around the world. In this episode our hosts will bust some myths about Punjabi cuisine and introduce you to some delicious recipes starting with Dhaba style butter chicken by Adam. We then move to a popular Ma ki Dal' (lentils) by Helly along with a blood lime pickle that is full of protein for our vegetarian friends. Finally, Sandeep shares his recipe for a lacha paratha (bread) and carrot raita.

programme.title: Building Giants S3
programme.desc: See the race to build the world's next generation of engineering wonders in this award-winning series.

programme.title: Celebrity Wheel Of Fortune S2
programme.desc: Various celebrities compete against each other by solving word puzzles in order to win cash prizes that are determined by a spinning wheel.

programme.title: Films & Stars
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: The Green Planet
programme.desc: We rely on plants for almost everything, including the air we breathe and the food we eat. Two in five wild plants are threatened with extinction, but people are finding new ways to help them, from projects in Africa to reseed the landscape to the rebuilding of a tropical forest in Brazil, tree by tree.

programme.title: Slugterra S1
programme.desc: Slugterra is an epic sci-fi comedy adventure set deep underground, where the ammo's alive and only the quick survive! In this luminous, high-tech, underground world every cavern holds a new adventure, new battle and weird little slugs to be discovered!

programme.title: Johnny Test S4
programme.desc: The adventures of average suburban boy Johnny Test, who wittingly plays test subject for his genius twin sisters' various experiments, reluctantly fighting evil villains in the process.

programme.title: Pororo The Little Penguin S6
programme.desc: Join Pororo and friends in their fun adventures!

programme.title: Pororo The Little Penguin S6
programme.desc: Join Pororo and friends in their fun adventures!

programme.title: Sunshine Station
programme.desc: Jimmy and Jenny run a very special bus station - the Sunshine Station! It isn't just a place you go to get to a destination. It is a destination in itself - a destination of endless fun, songs, dances, discovery and wonders! At the Sunshine Station, pre-schoolers embark on a learning journey to discover the world around them by going to various interesting locations around Singapore.

programme.title: Pinkfong Songs & Stories
programme.desc: Enjoy the best of Pinkfong's most loved songs and stories with all your favourite characters!

programme.title: Sesame Street S53
programme.desc: In this season, Ji-Young, a Korean-American girl muppet joins the main cast!

programme.title: Dora And Friends: Into The City S2
programme.desc: Dora, a young girl, starts going to school in the city of Playa Verde. Along with her friends, Kate, Naiya, Emma, Alana and Pablo, Dora embarks on various adventures to explore the city.

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S6
programme.desc: The Triangle Man is in such a rush that he can't take the time to fix things along the way. What happens when the imp steals masterpiece from the museum? Will Ollie and the gang be able to stop him? Will The Triangle Man learn to stop hurrying and do what it needs to be done? The squares can't keep their hands to themselves. They keep going to places they shouldn't and touching other people's things without asking their permission. Things go wrong when they decide to take the aliens' spaceship.

programme.title: GUS The Itsy Bitsy Knight
programme.desc: Follow small, grasshopper-sized boy named Gus who wishes to become the greatest knight in all the kingdom of Karamel! Armed with his laser sword and mounted on his electric pony, Gus will never miss an opportunity to pursue adventure and win the day.

programme.desc: A monster truck and his human driver go on adventures together while learning about science, technology, engineering and math.

programme.title: Power Players
programme.desc: Axel is sick of being the nice, enthusiastic little boy that everyone likes. He dreams of being an unsung hero, cold and lonesome... much cooler, if you ask him!

programme.title: Transformers Earthspark S1
programme.desc: A new species of Transformers must find their place and purpose among Autobots, Decepticons, and the human family who adopts them.

programme.title: The Haunted House: Secret Of The Ghost Ball
programme.desc: There is something not quite right about Shinbi Apartment. Ever since siblings Hari and Doori moved in, they could tell right away that everything seemed a little off. Is it the look? Is it the feel? Is it the smell? Maybe it is the ghosts!

programme.title: Mount Emily: Guardians Of The Crystal
programme.desc: In 1819, Baba's students are put through a dirty test to learn the true meaning of strength. In 1989, Patsy and Elena struggle without the use of their gadgets - from finding their way home to proper behavior and fitting in at school.

programme.title: On The Red Dot - Bargain Hunters
programme.desc: One couple gets business class tickets for free. One executive gets free eats all the time. Another shopper regularly pays almost half price for her buys. Their secret? Earning points as they spend.

programme.title: Talking Point
programme.desc: Accidents involving express buses claimed the lives of at least 19 people between 2020 and 2023 in Malaysia. 9 of these accidents involved passengers from Singapore. Just how safe are express buses in Malaysia? And what should we do if we find ourselves caught in an accident across the causeway?

programme.title: Crimewatch 2024
programme.desc: Crimewatch started its run in November 1986 and is the longest running English docu-drama series in Singapore. The programme showcases crimes solved by the Singapore Police Force, features appeals for unsolved cases and dispenses crime prevention advice to promote public awareness towards trending crimes.

programme.title: Clean It, Fix It S2
programme.desc: Master builder and household favourite Tommy Walsh is joined by expert pro cleaner Maxine Dwyer and creative carpenter Asher Edwards, as they meet people across the UK who are struggling with household chaos, grime and clutter. Much more than a makeover show, our dynamic professionals provide real-life, practical solutions, invaluable tips and insider tricks to give viewers brilliant take-away ideas for bettering their own living spaces.

programme.title: The Chefs' Line S2
programme.desc: Every top restaurant has a line of chefs leading to the top, from the Commis chef to the Head chef. This celebratory cooking competition pitches at-home cooking enthusiasts against professionals, starting at the bottom and working their way up. Can they beat their way to the top of The Chef's Line?

programme.title: Press Your Luck S2
programme.desc: Hosted by Elizabeth Banks, Press Your Luck is a game of wits, strategy and even higher stakes as contestants try to avoid the iconic and devilish WHAMMY for a chance at life-changing cash and prizes. During each game of Press Your Luck, three contestants compete against each other, answering questions to earn spins on the Big Board.

programme.title: 至尊红颜
programme.desc: 豪门贾家内部暗流汹涌。三女增金 (陈丽贞) 因丈夫奇才 (黄奕良) 而被卷入命案，并与侄子若其 (许立桦) 反目成仇。她害死两条人命后被赶出家门，儿子玉其 (张向晖) 也被诬告入狱。贾家媳妇曦怡 (范文芳) 也与四女增银陷入三角关系的情爱纠纷被迫离去，最后情场失足。孙女婿仲贤 (曹国辉) 加入贾家金乐集团后，就把它占为己有。曦怡、增金、若其三人后来重聚，觉悟己非，才找出了命案真凶，奇才父子含冤得雪。曦怡和增金回归贾家，把仲贤逼出家族企业。金乐最终虽难逃解体命运，却换来一家人融洽的相处.

programme.title: 敦煌，千年不散的宴席
programme.desc: (PG) 中华民族之所以五千年生生不息、绵延不绝，就是因为我们的语言、文字、风俗、饮食都是千年传承，从来没有中断。观众发现，以往秦川、安秋导演创作的敦煌纪录片都承载了非常厚重的历史文化信息，这次的美食片却大不一样，从主题定位、人物故事、叙事方式等都有了非常大的改变，叙述风格也生动活泼了很多，让观众看到了更多的人间烟火，一种田园诗般的美。该片通过将敦煌壁画饮食文化呈现出来，并将当下敦煌百姓的生活状态、一日三餐、加工食物的过程忠实记录下来，以展现敦煌饮食文化的传承与发展。.
